item.title: China's Offshore Oil Drilling Expands for Energy Security
item.description: China’s Offshore Oil Drilling Expands for Energy Security China is expanding its offshore oil drilling in order to secure its energy supply. The expansion is being driven by a number of factors, including the country’s growing population and economy, and the need to reduce its reliance on imported oil.
